types:type.name: test
types:type.types:shape: %dw 2.0 type test = {| date: Array<String>, description: Array<String>, id: Array<Number {"typeId": "int"}>, source: Array<String>, ammount: Array<String>, cardNumber: Array<String>, transaction: Array<String>, status: Array<String> |} {"MetadataFormat": "json", "example": "{\"date\":[\"a2\"],\"description\":[\"2018-12-10T00:00:00\"],\"id\":[4500],\"source\":[\"1111 1111 1111 1111\"],\"ammount\":[\"idk\"],\"cardNumber\":[\"Here is some stuff\"],\"transaction\":[\"pending\"],\"status\":[\"charge\"]}"}

types:type.name: try
types:type.types:shape: %dw 2.0 type try = {| AMOUNT: Number {"typeId": "int"}, CARD_NUMBER: String, TRANS_SOURCE: String, TRANS_DESCRIPTION: String, TRANSACTION_DATE: String, TRANS_TYPE: String, STATUS: String, TRANSACTION_ID: String |} {"MetadataFormat": "json", "example": "{\"AMOUNT\":6500,\"CARD_NUMBER\":\"1111 1111 1111 1111\",\"TRANS_SOURCE\":\"idk\",\"TRANS_DESCRIPTION\":\"Here is some stuff\",\"TRANSACTION_DATE\":\"2018-11-11T00:00:00\",\"TRANS_TYPE\":\"charge\",\"STATUS\":\"complete\",\"TRANSACTION_ID\":\"a77\"}"}
